name: craigslist-scraper
description: Scrape Craigslist roommate listings with AI-powered search

scripts.scrape: npx tsc scraper.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop && node scraper.js
scripts.chat: npx tsc housing-agent.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop && node housing-agent.js
